mutants.code:
def max_occurrences_of_01(N, S):
    evens = S[1::2]
    odds = S[::2]
    odds0 = odds.count('0')
    odds1 = odds.count('1')
    evens0 = evens.count('0')
    evens1 = evens.count('1')
    val1 = min(odds0, evens1)
    x = N | 1
    valid = max(0, N // 2 - val1 - 1 + x)
    val2 = min(odds1, evens0)
    ans = val1 + min(valid, val2)
    return ans

def max_occurrences_of_01(N, S):
    evens = S[1::2]
    odds = S[::2]
    odds0 = odds.count('0')
    odds1 = odds.count('1')
    evens0 = evens.count('0')
    evens1 = evens.count('1')
    val1 = min(odds0, evens1)
    x = N & 1
    valid = max(0, N // 2 - val1 - 1 + x)
    val2 = min(odds1, evens0)
    ans = val1 - min(valid, val2)
    return ans
